00048 //namespace me {
00049 class MaxentModelFile : boost::noncopyable {
00050     public:
00051         MaxentModelFile();
00052         shared_ptr<me::PredMapType> pred_map();
00053         shared_ptr<me::OutcomeMapType> outcome_map();
00054         void params(shared_ptr<me::ParamsType>& params, size_t& n_theta,
00055                 shared_array<double>& theta);
00056 
00057         void set_pred_map(shared_ptr<me::PredMapType> pred_map);
00058         void set_outcome_map(shared_ptr<me::OutcomeMapType> outcome_map);
00059         void set_params(shared_ptr<me::ParamsType> params, size_t n_theta, 
00060                 shared_array<double> theta);
00061 
00062         void load(const string& model);
00063         void save(const string& model, bool binary);
00064 
00065     private:
00066         void load_model_txt(const string& model);
00067         void save_model_txt(const string& model);
00068         void save_model_bin(const string& model);
00069         void load_model_bin(const string& model);
00070 
00071         size_t m_n_theta; // number of feature weights
00072         shared_ptr<me::ParamsType>     m_params;    // params for builtin model
00073         shared_array<double>       m_theta;         // feature weight
00074         // shared_array<double>       m_sigma;         // Gaussian prior
00075         shared_ptr<me::PredMapType>    m_pred_map;
00076         shared_ptr<me::OutcomeMapType> m_outcome_map;
00077 };
00078 //} // namespace me

00082     public:
00083         RandomFieldModelFile();
00084

00088

00092 
00093         void load(const string& model);
00094 
00095         void save(const string& model, bool binary);
00096 
00097     private:
00098         void load_model_txt(const string& model);
00099         void save_model_txt(const string& model);
00100         void save_model_bin(const string& model);
00101         void load_model_bin(const string& model);
00102 
00103         double m_Z; // global constant
00104         size_t m_n_theta; // number of feature weights
00105         shared_array<double>       m_theta;         // feature weight
00106         shared_ptr<rf::featmap_type>    m_feat_map;
00107 
00108 };
